title: Journal of a Summer Tour in the Perthshire and Inverness-shire Highlands
author: Roger, James Cruikshank.
snippet: According to Dundee's Memoirs,written in 1711 by an officer of the army,Dundee fell at Killicrankie, and after the battlehis body and that of Haliburton of Pitcur wereentombed in the church of Blair.
